QuestData.Title: Reprisal
QuestData.Description: I happen to know some Alliance scum that have somethin' coming to them. And they have something that belongs to us. I've authorized an all out assault on Highbank.$B$BBoard the Skyshredder and join the assault. Patch will fill you in on the details as you arrive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Patch aboard the Skyshredder circling Highbank.
QuestData.RewardText: Good to have you, $n. Ready to sow some chaos?
